mainBoard.name: Brothers Yamazaki
mainBoard.originalText:
Bushido 1 (When this blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
If there are exactly two permanents named Brothers Yamazaki in play, the "legend rule" doesn't apply to them.
Each other creature named Brothers Yamazaki gets +2/+2 and has haste.

rulings.text: The two Brothers could be controlled by different players.
There are two versions of this card, each with different art. The cards are numbered 160a/306 and 160b/306. The art has no effect on game play.

If a third Brothers Yamazaki enters the battlefield, the legend rule will apply. If one player controls more than one Brothers Yamazaki at that time, that player will have choose one and put the rest into their graveyard.

{1}{R} : Kumano, maître yamabushi, inflige 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur.
Si une créature ayant subi ce tour des blessures de Kumano, maître yamabushi devait être mise dans un cimetière, retirez-la de la partie à la place.

foreignData.name: Kumano, Maestro Yamabushi
foreignData.text:
{1}{R}: Kumano, Maestro Yamabushi infligge 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.
Se una creatura a cui sia stato inflitto danno da Kumano in questo turno sta per essere messa in un cimitero, invece rimuovila dal gioco.

foreignData.name: 山伏の長、熊野
foreignData.text:
{1}{R}：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。山伏の長、熊野はそれに１点のダメージを与える。
このターン、山伏の長、熊野にダメージを与えられたクリーチャーがいずれかの墓地に置かれる場合、代わりにそれをゲームから取り除く。
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・シャーマン

foreignData.name: Kumano, Mestre Yamabushi
foreignData.text:
{1}{R}: Kumano, Mestre Yamabushi causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.
Se uma criatura que sofreu dano causado por Kumano neste turno seria colocada num cemitério, em vez disso remova-a de jogo.

foreignData.name: 熊野大师
foreignData.text:
{1}{R}：熊野大师对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。
若本回合中受到熊野之伤害的生物将置入坟墓场，则改为将其移出对战。

mainBoard.name: Kumano, Master Yamabushi
mainBoard.originalText:
{1}{R}: Kumano, Master Yamabushi deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
If a creature dealt damage by Kumano this turn would be put into a graveyard, remove it from the game instead.

rulings.text: Kumano, Master Yamabushi must be on the battlefield when the creature would be put into a graveyard in order to exile it.
If a creature dealt damage by Kumano this turn would be put into a graveyard, exile it, even if it’s going to the graveyard at the same time as Kumano.

mainBoard.text:
{1}{R}: Kumano, Master Yamabushi deals 1 damage to any target.
If a creature dealt damage by Kumano this turn would die, exile it instead.

mainBoard.flavorText: The most powerful of akki fire spells were developed at the cost of blood, toil, tears, sweat, and usually a nose or two.
